    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Store getInstance()
        Global access point for the Store object.
        Returns:
        Returns single instance of store.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(stock.Item imported,
                    int amount)
        Adds an item to the store's inventory of a given quantity.
        Parameters:
        imported - Item to be added to the store's inventory.
        amount - Amount of the item to be added.

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(stock.Item removed,
                       int amount)
        Remove an item from the store's inventory.
        Parameters:
        removed - Item to be removed from the inventory.
        amount - Quantity of the item to be removed.

      • getItemQuantity

        public int getItemQuantity(stock.Item item)
        Get the quantity of an item within the store's inventory.
        Parameters:
        item - The item whose quantity is returned.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer equal to the amount of the item within the inventory.

      • loadItemProperties

        public void loadItemProperties(java.util.List<stock.Item> newItems)
        Loads new items from external list into the store's inventory. Overrides existing item with shared name but preserves quantity.
        Parameters:
        newItems - List of new items to be added.

      • loadSalesLog

        public void loadSalesLog(java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> sales)
        Loads weekly sales log to the store. Adjusts stock levels and capital accordingly.
        Parameters:
        sales - List of values to be loaded as item names and quantities.

      • loadManifest

        public void loadManifest(delivery.Manifest delivery)
                  throws delivery.DeliveryException
        Receives and processes a manifest as if it were delivered. Pay's up front and replenishes stock levels.
        Parameters:
        delivery - Manifest to be processed.
        Throws:
        delivery.DeliveryException - Throw if there are miscellaneous errors accessing information.

      • getManifest

        public delivery.Manifest getManifest()
                              throws delivery.TruckOverloadException
        Generates a manifest to be delivered to the store based on the levels of inventory.
        Returns:
        Returns a manifest for stock reusable.
        Throws:
        delivery.TruckOverloadException - Trucks have been loaded with more stock than they can fit.

      • getReorder

        public stock.Stock getReorder()
        Generates Stock object of items and quantities that need to be reordered.
        Returns:
        Returns Stock object of reorder.

      • getItemByName

        public stock.Item getItemByName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets an item object when only the name is accessible.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item to be returned.
        Returns:
        The item of which the name belongs to.

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the Store.

        Returns the store's capital.

      • getStock

        public stock.Stock getStock()
